website_summaries.verdict: Really inexpensive canister style vacuum cleaner that you can carry anywhere.
pros: Includes an automatic cord rewind feature, which is nice to have in this low price point
Weighs less than 12 pounds, so you can take it anywhere
Gives you a 17-foot power cord so you can work in a large area before having to move the cord to a new outlet
Works with both hard flooring and carpeting
cons: May generate a high pitched noise as it runs

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow, for such a little price this is a very solid and hardworking vacuum cleaner. Very pleased with this purchase. Live in a vertical house with 4 floors if you count the basement. I keep a vac on each floor. Have fancy ones upstairs but this will do fine for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A. Knauer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little dynamo
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Eureka Rally....I love this little dynamo....I hope Eureka never stops making it..
customer_reviews.author: queenbgal

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: My old eureka finally had to go...20 years later. Really wanted one with the same amount or better suction. This one is it! The bag is super easy to replace, this vacuum works awesome! With birds n a dog....this really gets my house clean :o) Thank you Eureka!
customer_reviews.author: klair

customer_reviews.title: cheap made
customer_reviews.text: cheap made and hard to use cord to short and you have to turn the damn thing upside down to unwind and rewind the cord
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum .. plenty of power and easy to handle !!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven  E Deans

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Size is good. Does want to tip over when pulling across the floor but not a cleaning issue. Wanted a small canister vacuum to use for where my upright won't go. Haven't had for long so don't know about longevity. Would probably recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Deabler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: Order was received with damaged and part missing. Box was received un-sealed. Am waiying for Fed-Ex to pick-up box and retrun item. Have received a shipping label from Izzo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum, arrived damaged tho
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little vacuum, suction is great, works great, but........it arrived with the hose crushed, so if I turn the wrong way the hose collapses and I completely lose suction. Hence the three stars, otherwise it would be a five.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. Exactly what I expected it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Exactly what I expected it to be and works great. Had no issues with shipping time and recieveing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It’s work
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine and everybody should buy it. The number one vacuum cleaner you come first to buy
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum as a replacement for the exact model which did well for years.
customer_reviews.author: ifromtennessee

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum for my wood floors. Suction is very powerful. I did purchase a separate brush attachment for the wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: Best Hard Floor Vacuum Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning company and this is the only vacuum I’ve ever relied on or trusted buying. It picks up everything except the normal things that shouldn’t be vacuumed up. It’s sucks most stuff off carpets but doesn’t leave carpet lines which most people like to see. The bags are quite small and I go through quite a bit since I clean many houses a week. Great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My search is over!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs...lightweight but powerful. Would like some attachments though.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bruen

customer_reviews.title: PARTS NOT AVAILABLE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable that you cannot buy parts for this machine. And the vacuum cleaner is still being sold. My dust bag holder is broken and you cannot get the part for it any longer. The vacuum is still being sold too. I am so upset with Eureka, the vacuum was pretty good would have given it 4+ stars, but this negates everything. Don't break or lose any part of this thing or you'll be S.O.L. !!!! the same exact thing happened with their prior model. Something broke and too bad!!!! I hate Eureka!!
customer_reviews.author: hikeswithdogs

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's because my other vacuumed just pushed dirt around, but my flows have never looked cleaner! I was looking for something reletively straightforward, not a huge fan of standing vacuums that are bagless. I love the long hose and the sucking power.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Made very well like 'they used to make 'em'
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little can vac! Made very well like 'they used to make 'em'. Retracting cord is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Wife & Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great canister vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my car vac, and love it.
customer_reviews.author: ZCONCET100

product_meta.title: Eureka Rally 2 Canister Bagged Automatic Rewind Vacuum Corded with Hose & Tools
